text: This article lists the Labour Party's election results from the 1922 United Kingdom general election to 1929, including by-elections. All candidates were sponsored, in some cases by the Divisional Labour Party (noted as "Constituency"). During this period, full details of the sponsorship of candidates were not reported; where known, they are listed. == Summary of general election performance == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
